definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.chinese: “晚安”伊娃說，她搬起另一把椅子。

sentences.english: These arenormally sedate affairs where empty chairs outnumber the audience.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，空椅子比聽衆多是讀書會上很平常的事。

sentences.english: After lunch my father dozes in his chair.
sentences.chinese: 喫過午飯後我父親總在他的椅子上打個盹。

sentences.english: The night watchman brought the armchair for Hewson. He tried to make him laugh.
sentences.chinese: 守夜人給休森搬來了一張椅子，順便逗一下他。

sentences.english: His job is to bend the steel to make chairs.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作就是弄彎鋼材來做椅子。

sentences.english: Furniture such as tables, chairs and cupboards is also made from wood.
sentences.chinese: 如桌子，椅子，廚櫃這類傢俱也是由木做成的。

sentences.english: When I reached his table, I stood behind the chair across from him, unsure.
sentences.chinese: 我走到他的桌子旁，不太確定地站在他對面的椅子後。

sentences.english: So why is the humble chair being blacklisted?
sentences.chinese: 但爲什麼這次是“老實巴交”的椅子被列入黑名單呢？

sentences.english: The red chairs, the lamps and the table are from the street.
sentences.chinese: 紅椅子，燈和桌子是從街上撿來的。

sentences.english: I sat in a chair and see the round moon, just like a kind of returning to the poetic.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在椅子上，看那輪圓月，就宛如一種久違的詩意。

sentences.english: He released his hand and sat down in the chair, fuming.
sentences.chinese: 他一把放手，氣鼓鼓坐在那張椅子裏。

sentences.english: We shall cover the seat of this old chair with chintz.
sentences.chinese: 我們將用印花布罩住這舊椅子的椅面。

sentences.english: The paper discusses design requirements from the perspective of manikin engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文從人體工程學角度論述了椅子的設計要求。

sentences.english: We all have a chair that designates a position in our career.
sentences.chinese: 我們都有一張椅子到指定位置，在我們的事業。

sentences.english: With the radio on, grandma slept deeply in the chair .
sentences.chinese: 無線電收音機開者，祖母在椅子裏沉沉的入睡。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
